unnormalised: Campus hiring at IIT Delhi and IIM Ahmedabad remains crucial for talent acquisition. Dr. Sharma's insights on integrating Gen Z from these institutions are invaluable. This year, we aim to recruit 50+ freshers. Budget allocation for training programs is Rs. 20 Lakhs. Office space expansion by 1000 sq ft will accommodate new hires. Expecting joining by June 15th. A robust onboarding process including cultural sensitivity training is planned. Good initiative!
